tool.name: Genion
tool.description: : Wrapper class for the GROMACS genion module.

param.label: input TPR file
param.help: Path to the input portable run input TPR file. Format: [input].tpr

param.name: input_top_zip_path
param.label: input ZIP file
param.help: Path the input TOP topology in zip format. Format: [input].zip

param.name: outname_output_gro_path
param.label: output GRO name
param.help: Path to the input structure GRO file Format: [output].gro

param.name: outname_output_top_zip_path
param.label: output ZIP name
param.help: Path the output topology TOP and ITP files zipball Format: [output].zip

param.name: sele

param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.help: Path the output topology TOP file.

param.label: replaced_group

param.name: neutral
param.label: neutral
param.help: Neutralize the charge of the system.

param.label: gmx_path
